content.rendered:
They say a successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person. We couldn't agree more, and we're falling in love all over again with Katie and Andrew's vintage-inspired boho wedding at The Bell Tower.

Romantically captured by 30 Miles West, their day included a stunning ceremony between the windows on a sunny spring day.

A tall whimsical greenery arch framed the couple as they exchanged vows. While geometric vases filled with moss and stunning arrangements filled with bright pops of color lined chic wooden farm tables for the reception.

One of our favorite moments was watching this sweet pair as they danced for the first time as husband and wife under sweet string lighting as guests looked on from the mezzanine above.

Happy four year anniversary to Katie and Andrew and here's to another four and more!

Keep scrolling to peep more from this vintage-inspired boho wedding.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: April 25, 2015
Bride & Groom: Katie and Andrew
Location: The Bell Tower
Colors: Greenery
Photographer: 30 Miles West
Florist: Basil & Bergamot & Silk & Willow
DJ: DJ Rich
Bar: Infinity Hospitality
Catering: Smoke Et Al
Production Design: IH
Planning: IH

excerpt.rendered: A vintage-inspired wedding with bohemian touches at The Bell Tower.
